Blacksmith Aios:
May the spledor of mithril forever shine on the forest and lake! I am a blacksmith and I look over the weapons and armour of my Elven brothers. I have just returned from the Dwarven Kingdom, in the north where I learned how to process adamantium and oriharukon.
I have finished setting up my shop and am ready to start work. Now, what do you need?
